items.title: How To Master Your Origin Challenge

visible_instructors.name: Skip
visible_instructors.title: Skip Cummins

items.headline: Discover and improve the origin programming that shaped who and what you are.
objectives_summary: This course is designed in 6 sections to empower you with the knowledge and tools to understand, own and revise as appropriate your origin programming, namely the behavioral, social, emotional, intellectual and psychological “DNA” given to you by your parents and others during your first 18 years of life when you are the most open, most impressionable and most programmable.  Then redefine and realize your full potential.  By thoroughly planning, frequently measuring, frequently reporting and appropriately rewarding your growth.
